Subjects: proverbs; translations; evils of the time; abuses of the age
_description: On the evils of the time, trans. ‘Prudente ceci cognati degenerantur…’ — one monorhyming quatrain

BLAdd60577.Transcription:
Wysse men are blynd& kynnysmen are vnkyndedethe ys oute of
                    myndeand frende can no man fynde
